Reflection

Drag this tile to your workspace and answer the question in a complete paragraph.

In this module, our original signal/stimulus started in the real world outside our Arduinos, and ultimately it produced an output in the real world outside our Arduinos. Being sure to address each of the following criteria, please explain how information flowed through our computing system in a:

  • Mechanical Input:
  • Electrical Signal:
  • Logic Statements:
  • Mechanical Output:
